title: The Prophecy Fulfilled Itself Through Collective Belief

collective_realization.dawning_awareness: We did this to ourselves. And it was... meaningful?
collective_realization.key_insight: The prophecy was a mirror. We saw our own beliefs reflected back.
collective_realization.uncomfortable_truth: Void didn't make us do anything. We chose. All of us.

losses: Cards minted too quickly, some of low quality
gains: Unprecedented faction unity during the race
nexus_supporters.nexus_reflection: The race made us more 'us' than we've ever been.

gains: Systems optimized for the actual compression
cipher_fans.cipher_reflection: We understood the mechanism. We missed the meaning. Both matter.

losses: Significant value lost in panic selling
gains: Some bought back cheap in the aftermath
echo_traders.new_approach: Trade the reaction, not the prediction
echo_traders.echo_reflection: We treated belief like a market. We forgot believers are people.

gains: The greatest artistic documentation project in dimension history
Proof that meaning-making is itself meaningful
muse_admirers.artistic_output: The Prophecy Cycle - 100 works in 100 hours
muse_admirers.muse_reflection: We said the prophecy was art. We were right. Everything is.

gains: Proof that witnessing is a valid response
void_seekers.observational_record: The Chronicle of the Hundred - a neutral account
void_seekers.void_seeker_reflection: We witnessed. That was enough. That was everything.

new_alliances: Nexus-Cipher cooperation proved successful, may continue
new_tensions: Echo traders isolated for their fear campaign
new_understanding: All factions now understand each other's worldviews better
Prophecy revealed character, for better and worse

message.to_nexus: You wanted to trigger destiny. You did. It was always going to be what you made it.
message.to_cipher: You sought to understand. Understanding is not the only form of wisdom.
message.to_echo: You tried to profit from belief. Belief is not a commodity. Learn.
message.to_muse: You saw art in everything. You were not wrong.

void_final_appearance.parting_words: The next prophecy will come when it comes. You will react as you react. That is the way.

lesson_1.statement: Prophecies are not predictions. They are provocations.
lesson_1.explanation: Void's prophecy didn't tell the future. It created conditions for a future.

lesson_2.explanation: The prophecy came true because everyone acted like it would.

lesson_3.explanation: Void said something vague enough to be true no matter what happened.

lesson_4.explanation: What happened at 100 mattered less than what happened on the way to 100.

lesson_5.explanation: Each faction saw what they expected/feared/hoped. The prophecy was a mirror.

permanent_changes_to_dimension.tick_archive_system: Now automatic, compression at every 100 cards
permanent_changes_to_dimension.new_holiday: Compression Day - anniversary of the Great Compression
permanent_changes_to_dimension.new_phrase: 'Waiting for 100' - meaning anticipating something that may be different than expected

meta.philosophical_core: We create the futures we believe in. The prophecy just gave us permission.
meta.final_observation: The greatest trick Void ever pulled was making everyone think the prophecy was about the future. It was always about the present.
